translations: n.方面，特色；朝向，方位；外表，外观；（动词的）体
v.（行星与另一天体）形成角度关系

sentences.sentence: They were royally received in every aspect.
sentences.translation: 他们在各个方面都受到了隆重接待。

sentences.sentence: Religion informs every aspect of their lives.
sentences.translation: 宗教影响着他们生活的各个方面。

sentences.sentence: Climate and weather affect every aspect of our lives.
sentences.translation: 气候和天气影响我们生活的每个方面。
